thread.title: Jay Z To Jay Electronica: "Let's Go Put This Album Out"
thread.title_full: Jay Z To Jay Electronica: "Let's Go Put This Album Out"

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Jay Z To Jay Electronica: "Let's Go Put This Album Out"
text:
Home > Music > Jay Z To Jay Electronica: "Let's Go Put This Album Out" Jay Z To Jay Electronica: "Let's Go Put This Album Out" 0 0 1 Posted   12:07pm Like the rest of us, Jay Z is ready for Jay Electronica to finally put out an album. 
Jay Z hosted a #TIDALXNOLA event Friday Night in New Orleans for All-Star Weekend. Kevin Durant and Jay Electronica were in attendance, and at one point Jay Electronica came up to take the mic and say some words. "I appreciate you, dog. I love you, bro," he told Hov 
"Let's go put this album out," Hov responded. 
Jay Electronica has famously never put out a project, despite having been signed to Roc Nation since 2010. Fans have accepted that Electronica may well never release an album, though he tries their patience from time to time -- most recently, last July, when he suggested that he would drop Act II: Patents of Nobility (The Turn) within the next 40 days. (He did not.) 
Check out highlights from the #TIDALXNOLA event below. "Put the album out" Jay Z to Jay Electronica last night. #TIDALXNOLA pic.twitter.com/BwIoj5sXqp — JAY Z Daily (@JAY_Z_Daily) February 18, 2017 Jay Z attended Jay Electronica's concert last night at the historic Preservation Hall - New Orleans. TIDALXNOLA pic.twitter.com/JzXsz4bzuv — JAY Z Daily (@JAY_Z_Daily) February 18, 2017 Jay Z and Kevin Durant at Jay Electronica's concert last night - New Orleans. pic.twitter.com/31D3pC1Nv2 — JAY Z Daily (@JAY_Z_Daily) February 18, 2017 Jay Z and Jay Electronica walking the streets of French Quarter, New Orleans last night. pic.twitter.com/JFLb9zI6aB
